blogPost.title: How can you identify anti-mentors and use tactics to change the power dynamic? Answer by @ElizaVancort, Author: A Woman's Guide to Claiming Space: Stand Tall Raise Your Voice Be Heard. https://t.co/vyYONyfJ7y https://t.co/Hv59SIFnrB
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: アンチメンターを見極め、力関係を変える戦術をとるにはどうすればいいか？回答者：@ElizaVancort（著者）。A Woman's Guide to Claiming Space: Stand Tall Raise Your Voice Be Heard. https://t.co/vyYONyfJ7y https://t.co/Hv59SIFnrB
如何识别反辅导员并使用战术来改变权力动态？回答者：@ElizaVancort，作者。一个女人主张空间的指南。站在高处，提高你的声音被听到。https://t.co/vyYONyfJ7y https://t.co/Hv59SIFnrB
如何識別反輔導員並使用戰術來改變權力動態？回答者：@ElizaVancort，作者。一個女人主張空間的指南。站在高處，提高你的聲音被聽到。https://t.co/vyYONyfJ7y https://t.co/Hv59SIFnrB

previous.title: What are some good tips for companies who want to develop AI/digital first strategies? Answer by Akshay Sharma, CTO, https://t.co/La19gX4K0g. https://t.co/ogAwr104HC https://t.co/Y1fHTScfNr

localize.full_text: AI/デジタルファースト戦略を展開したい企業にとって、良いヒントがあれば教えてください。回答者：Akshay Sharma（CTO） https://t.co/La19gX4K0g https://t.co/ogAwr104HC https://t.co/Y1fHTScfNr
对于想要制定人工智能/数字优先战略的公司，有什么好的建议？回答者：Akshay Sharma，CTO，https://t.co/La19gX4K0g。 https://t.co/ogAwr104HC https://t.co/Y1fHTScfNr
對於想要制定人工智能/數字優先戰略的公司，有什麼好的建議？回答者：Akshay Sharma，CTO，https://t.co/La19gX4K0g。 https://t.co/ogAwr104HC https://t.co/Y1fHTScfNr

next.title: What are your day-to-day duties as President of Wesleyan University? Answer by @mroth78, 16th president @wesleyan_u. https://t.co/XrdWQ3o22Q https://t.co/B92Zt5CPFS

localize.full_text: ウェスリアン大学の学長としての日常業務はどのようなものですか？Answer by @mroth78, 16th president @wesleyan_u. https://t.co/XrdWQ3o22Q https://t.co/B92Zt5CPFS
你作为卫斯理大学校长的日常工作是什么？由 @mroth78, 16th president @wesleyan_u. https://t.co/XrdWQ3o22Q https://t.co/B92Zt5CPFS 回答
你作爲衛斯理大學校長的日常工作是什麼？由 @mroth78, 16th president @wesleyan_u. https://t.co/XrdWQ3o22Q https://t.co/B92Zt5CPFS 回答
